title: Aneurysm Location Facts Schema
description: Schema for knowledge about aneurysm locations including prevalence and clinical significance

rsna_label.description: Canonical RSNA label name matching the rsna_labels.schema.json

prevalence_pct.description: Estimated prevalence percentage in the general population

bleed_pattern.description: Typical hemorrhage patterns associated with aneurysms in this location

imaging_tips.description: Imaging protocols or views that best visualize this location

aliases.description: Alternative names or abbreviations for this location

vessel_diameter_mm.description: Typical vessel diameter range in millimeters

rupture_risk_factors.description: Factors that may increase rupture risk for this location

references.description: Citations or references supporting this information

last_updated.description: Date when this information was last reviewed/updated (YYYY-MM-DD)
